subject: OFFICE OF THE DIRECTOR INT'L
body:
OFFICE OF THE DIRECTOR INT'L REMITTANCE DEPT (CBN)
CENTRAL BANK OFNIGERIA
FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA
Plot 33,Abubakar Tafawa BalewaWay
Central Business District,
Cadastral Zone,
P.M. B. 187,GarkiAbuja .
Nigeria.
5/12/2023
Attention:Honorable Fund Beneficiary,
Dear Sir / Madam,
We write to inform you that as at Monday being 4th of November, 2023, we received a letter from Peter & Mason, LLC, a law firm in the United States of America that you have directed his law firm to work with Central Bank of Nigeria and make a change of ownership in regards to your outstanding sum of US$10.5million from you to one MICHAEL CRAIG RIXIE as the new beneficiary of US$5.5million, which they have already come up with the request sum of US$950 as program fee.
However, your urgent attention is highly needed just to confirm from you before we go ahead and proceed with Peter & Mason LLC. Law firm.
Below is the new name and account details for confirmation from you.
FULL NAME: MICHAEL CRAIG RIXIE
BANK INFORMATION:
BANK NAME: ALLY BANK
BANK ADDRESS: P.O. BOX 13625 PHILADELPHIA, PA 19101
NAME ON ACCOUNT: MICHAEL CRAIG RIXIE
ROUTING NUMBER: 124003116
ACCOUNT NUMBER: 2117268173
SWIFT CODE: ALLYUS33
It is  important you reply to this message today, so that we can fully comply with your directive and make the necessary changes and thereafter transfer the fund to the new beneficiary, which we hope is working with you.
Thank you,
Dr.Rogers Picard Marc,
Consultant To the  Governor,
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA. (CBN).

subject: Re:   OFFICE OF THE DIRECTOR INT'L
body:
Hello Picard Marc,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I wasn't expecting any communication from the Central Bank of Nigeria. 

I'm not sure I understand everything correctly though. Could you please clarify what this change of ownership means? And who exactly is Michael Craig Rixie? 

Also, could you provide more details about Peter Mason LLC law firm? How did they get involved in this matter?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Breanne

subject: URGENT
body:
Office Of The President,
                                 Federal Republic Of Nigeria,
                                   Aso Rock Villa, Asokoro,
                                          Abuja-Nigeria.
                                            21/02/2024

Attention: Breanne ,

I have been directed by The President, Federal Republic Of Nigeria ,Mr
Bola Ahmed Tinubu, GCFR,to wade  and mitigate into the problems
surrounding your investment /Business/Contract transactions between
you and your Nigerian partners.
You are encouraged to furnish the Presidency, with the modalities and
progress so
far made between you and your co-partners in this transaction which
has taken so much time and is almost bringing public opprobrium to the name
and image
of the Federal Republic of Nigeria due to its non productive nature .
This has also put our citizens  into the bad books of the rest of the world.
The new President Of our country is not too happy about that hence this
move to correct it.
You are kindly,requested to respond within 24 hours of the receipt of this
mail and forward your id,
and a copy of your latest utility bill receipt and a secured phone /fax
number where you can be
reached on phone asap.
Thank you,
Dr. Picard Marc Rogers,
For The President Federal Republic Of Nigeria.

subject: Re: URGENT
body:
Hello Dr. Picard Marc Rogers,

Thank you for reaching out to me. It's an honor to be contacted by the Office of The President, Federal Republic Of Nigeria. I'm intrigued by your message and would like to understand more about this situation.

Could you please provide more details about the investment business contract you mentioned? I don't recall having any Nigerian partners or being involved in any such business contracts. 

Also, could you elaborate on what modalities and progress you're referring to? I'm a bit confused as I don't have any ongoing projects that might bring public opprobrium to the name and image of the Federal Republic of Nigeria.

I appreciate your patience and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Breanne
